6.125. sibl_gui.components.core.inspector.views¶

views.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the sibl_gui.components.core.inspector.inspector.Inspector Component Interface class Views.

Others:

6.125.1. Module Attributes¶

sibl_gui.components.core.inspector.views.LOGGER¶

6.125.2. Classes¶

class sibl_gui.components.core.inspector.views.Plates_QListView(parent, model=None, readOnly=False, message=None)[source]¶

Bases: sibl_gui.ui.views.Abstract_QListView

This class is used to display Ibl Sets Plates as thumbnails.

Parameters:
  • parent – Object parent. ( QObject )
  • model – Model. ( QObject )
  • readOnly – View is read only. ( Boolean )
  • message – View default message when Model is empty. ( String )
